text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden You’ve got to be kidding, Sessions.  I saw him drinking out of a glass, imitating himself walking on a ramp, calling Covid-19 the Kung Flu, threatening protestors and the media.  @JoeBiden doesnt want to match that.
